transcript.title: UNKNOWN
transcript.content:
PRIME MINISTER
FOR MEDIA 9 AUGUST 1990
I congratulate Joan Kirner on her election to the
Premiership. To this challenging assignment she brings
considerable experience including most recently the
important area of education.
Joan is a capable and committed parliamentarian who
deserves and, I believe, will receive the support of all
members of the Party.
I am looking forward to co-operating with her in
advancing the interests of the people of Victoria.
